ChangeLog

Version in repository

Complete port of Bibledit-Web.

Many minor changes and fixes.

Bible editor for one verse in formatted view.

The Manager role has access to all Bibles.

Release Bibledit Cloud.

Release Bibledit for Windows.

Release Bibledit for Mac.

Release Bibledit for Android.

Release Bibledit for iOS.

Release Bibledit for Linux.

Integrated Paratext bridge for seamless collaboration with Paratext USFM data.

Supports the major web browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Internet Explorer, Safari, Opera, Edge.

Support for USFM \b (Blank line).

Fixed: The caret jumps around in the USFM chapter editor.

Fixed: The number of characters in drop caps in OpenDocument export is always two.

Fixed: On the Bibledit clients, replacing does not work in a Bible.

Fixed: A client keeps sending a chapter with multiple spaces to the server.

Fixed: After applying the "ft" style to a footnote, it overwrites the \f ... \f*.

Fixed: When the Resources display a USFM resource or a Bible, and the USFM has italics as part of the word, there is a space in that word in the Resources.

Fixed: After entering details for the POP3 server, it only starts collecting email after restarting the server.

Fixed: When going to another verse in the chapter editor, the caret is placed some characters away from the start of the verse.

Fixed: Loses text following unescaped entities in a note subject when editing it.

Watchdog timer on send/receive notes.

When merging changes in a Bible chapter, prioritize changes from a Bible editor.

Fixed: When the Bible editors save text, the + signs disappear.

Fixed: The editor changes the \xt to \xo.

It completes a Bible save operation before starting another one.

It no longer automatically fixes a missing note caller.

Better animation of USFM chapter editor and a few more screens.

Fixed: On Windows, a burst of logs leads to an unclear journal.

The Bible editor indicates the focused verse after reload.

Fixed: Marker not in stylesheet: \+add*.

The workbench can pass a Bible to any of the four editors.

Fixed: The number of business day in a month on the sprint planning is incorrect.

Client synchronizes the Change Notifications with the Cloud.

Client refers user notifications to the Cloud.

Cloud removes downloadable revision notifications older than a month.

Cloud removes unprocessed user and team changes older than five days to automatically recover from crashes due to limited memory.

Automatically includes updated localizations from Launchpad crowd translation services.

The interface can be localized.

Clickable arrows for navigating to the previous or the next verse.

Can set write access to Bible per book.

Fixed: Server sends spurious messages about unable to merge client Bible data.

Improved transfer of workbenches between client and server.

Fixed: Loses any + sign when a client sends a Bible chapter to the cloud.

Support for combined verses like 10-12 and 12,13 and 10,11b.

Renumber notes after inserting or removing one in the visual chapter editor.

Deletes note body after removing the note caller in the visual chapter editor.

Can display context in the Resources.

Sprint planning is available in the Cloud only.

Can set the width of the entire workbench.

Watchdog timers on all sync actions for increased robustness on bad networks.

Central cache for external resources for clustered Bibledit Cloud installations.

Improved caching of the NET Bible.

One-click submission of Bible to the Bible Drop Box at http://freely-given.org/Software/BibleDropBox.

Note checksum cache for faster note synchronization in case of thousands of notes.

Smart nightly exports only export when the Bible text was updated.

Version 1.0

1 January 2015

Partial port of Bibledit-Web.
